questions.question: Who was the first woman to develop the first computer program?
Who was the first female computer scientist to earn the title of 'computer programmer'?
Who developed the first compiler, which is fundamental to programming languages?
Who is credited with creating the concept of 'packet switching,' which is foundational to the internet?
Which woman is known for her role in launching NASA's Apollo space missions as the software engineer who wrote the onboard flight software?
Who co-founded the technology company *Hewlett-Packard* (HP) and was the first woman to receive a computer science degree from Stanford?
Who is the co-founder of the social media giant *Facebook* and served as its Chief Operating Officer (COO)?
Which of the following women is NOT considered a major contributor to the field of artificial intelligence?
